item.title: For The It
item.content:
The cayenne pepper—also known as the Guinea spice,[1] cow-horn pepper, aleva, bird pepper,[2] or, especially in its powdered form, red pepper—is a hot chili pepper used to flavour dishes

It is named for the city of Cayenne in French Guiana

  • Sauce Vinegar-based
  • Cuisine), Korean,
  • In Powder
  • Cayenne (such

The Capsicum genus is in the nightshade family (Solanaceae)

It is a cultivar of Capsicum annuum related to bell peppers, jalapeños, paprika and others

It is a cultivar of Capsicum annuum related to bell peppers, jalapeños, paprika and othersThe fruits are generally dried and ground, or pulped and baked into cakes, which are then ground and sifted to make the powdered spice of the same name
